summary: Like the normal Skyrim launcher but for SKSE. looks little bit different.
descriptionHtml:
[center][code]﻿[/code]            [/center]
[size=4]Requirements[/size]
[list]
[*][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE_loader.exe [/url]in Skyrim folder
[*]At least played skyrim once on the machine you are installing it on.
[*].net framework 2.5
[*]Windows computer. (Tested on win10,8,7)
[*]Internet connection on first run do work as it should.
[*][color=#93c47d]\Data\tools\[/color][color=#38761d]TES5Edit.exe[/color] (Not necessary but if you want the shortcut to work)
[*][color=#6aa84f]\Data\tools\GenerateFNIS_for_Users\[/color][color=#38761d]GenerateFNISforUsers.exe [/color](Not necessary but if you want the shortcut to work)
[/list][size=4]Install Notes
   ﻿   ﻿[/size]1a. Move the TESVMP_Launcher.exe to skyrim directory (NOT DATA).[list=1]
      1b.[Optional] Replace the normal launcher with it. You'll need to rename it.
   2. Make a shortcut to it if you want.
   3. [Optional] Go to settings and check for updates.
   4. Done.[/list]
[size=4]Description [/size]
Ever wanted a custom launcher, a Skyrim launcher that YOU can customize however you want, and it's getting more customizable for every new patch coming!
And that's not enough even users that don't own this game from steam can also see how long they have been playing by built in game time counter!
We know about the past bugs and glitches, that's why I want to make sure everyone that want this program has the newest version :) 
To GUARANTEE that you have the best experience with this launcher.
Well of course people will say this program is unnecessary, but I don't mind at all, because I want this modding community to have many options, if someone are tired of the normal launcher then I want to make sure there are other options they can choose from!
If you click on PLAY it will start skyrim through SKSE unless you change it to open regular skyrim instead.[left][/left]
When you click on OPTIONS, it will open a window with all the options you can do so far in the program. More settings and functions will be coming in the future. Please tell me, if you have any ideas about what I can add.
And report any bug you can find so I can fix it!
EXIT will close the program.
﻿[color=#cc4125][size=4][b][code]Thanks for all donations, it really helps! ♥[/code][/b][/size][/color]
Help
   *If you mess up with the design so you cant reach the buttons. Open the program and press D and type show.options and hit enter. 
   The settings window will show up and from there you can change it so you can reach the buttons again. Or just delete "SKSELauncher.ini".
Version 2.0.2.0
   *Load order now is fixed.
   *Alot of bugs fixed.
   *Design on passwd.
   *Added passwd link.
   *Buttons position is not going change without you changing it from now on!
   *Commands now desplaying.
   *Crash on options.
   If any of these bugs remain in this version please tell me.
Version 2.0.0.0
   *Load order should work much better than before!
   *Changed the way it handles saved settings. It now supports Ini files which can be transferred from computer to another.
   *Settings is now saved between updates.
   *Less random bugs. If any troubles write in comments! 
   *Debug command added
   *Simple password protection write passwd in terminal, not tested!
   *Extended settings press (D)ebug on main window for more info!
   *Fixed bug that made it inpossible for users to fill all boxes.
   *Fixed bug that resets the settings when opening settings.
   *People can now make their own buttons (Not finished): O1NMs9w
Version 1.5.4.1
   *Fixed bug where the program froze while browsing loadorder.
   *Fixed bug where loadorder got mixed up between different games.
   *Added debug mode (press D and write help for more information).
   *Added loot shortcut.
   *Added more controls to Customise tab.
   *Fixed minor bugs.
   *Added support for SSE. Still more to do.
   *You can now replace the normal launcher with this one without any problems from steam or updater.
   *Fixed potential bug where it crashed on exit.
To be expected in future
   *Advanced settings will be more user friendly.
   *Custom buttons.
   *More support for SSE in options window.
   *ini support.
Known issues 
   *In some cases does loadorder freeze.
   *Missing icon in LOOT.
   *LOOT has problem to open.
   *More than one icon shows up in system tray.
Credits
   Azaaxin
Other Information
